languages.text: "Паутина кровоточит в знак скорби о Домин'Теодоре. Мы почитали подательницу жизни. Мы принесли щедрые жертвы, чтобы путь ее к Неумирающему был легок".
languages.translation_comment:
Speaker Kibellah
Abelard: "The crew continues to mourn Lady Theodora. I fear it may affect the performance of their duties in service of the Lord Captain."

languages.text: "The Web bleeds in mourning for Domin'Theodora. We honoured the Giver of Life. We made generous sacrifices so that her path to the Undying One would be easy."
languages.original_text: "Паутина кровоточит в знак скорби о Домин'Теодоре. Мы почитали подательницу жизни. Мы принесли щедрые жертвы, чтобы путь ее к Неумирающему был легок".

traits.locale_text: "The Web bleeds in mourning for Domin'Theodora. We honoured the giver of life. We made generous sacrifices so that her path to the Undying One would be easy."
"The Web bleeds in mourning for Domin'Theodora. We honoured the giver of life. We made generous sacrifices so that her path to the Undying One would be easy."
"The Web bleeds in mourning for Domin'Theodora. We honoured the giver of life. We made generous sacrifices so that her path to the Undying One would be easy."
"The Web bleeds in mourning for Domin'Theodora. We honoured the Giver of Life. We made generous sacrifices so that her path to the Undying One would be easy."
"The Web bleeds in mourning for Domin'Theodora. We honoured the Giver of Life. We made generous sacrifices so that her path to the Undying One would be easy."

languages.text: "Das Netz blutet aus Trauer um Domin'Theodora. Wir haben die Lebensspenderin geehrt. Wir haben großzügige Opfer dargebracht, damit ihr Pfad zum Todlosen leicht ist."
languages.original_text: "The Web bleeds in mourning for Domin'Theodora. We honoured the Giver of Life. We made generous sacrifices so that her path to the Undying One would be easy."

traits.locale_text: "Das Netz blutet aus Trauer um Domin'Theodora. Wir haben die Lebensspenderin geehrt. Wir haben großzügige Opfer dargebracht, damit ihr Pfad zum Todlosen leicht ist."

languages.text: « Le cœur de la toile saigne et pleure la perte de Domin'Théodora. Nous tenions la Source de vie en haute estime, et nous avons fait de généreux sacrifices pour faciliter son voyage jusqu'à l'Immortel. »
languages.original_text: "The Web bleeds in mourning for Domin'Theodora. We honoured the Giver of Life. We made generous sacrifices so that her path to the Undying One would be easy."

traits.locale_text: « Le cœur de la toile saigne et pleure la perte de Domin'Théodora. Nous tenions la Source de vie en haute estime, et nous avons fait de généreux sacrifices pour faciliter son voyage jusqu'à l'Immortel. »

languages.text: «La Red llora la muerte de Domin'Theodora. Honramos a la Dadora de Vida. Hicimos grandes sacrificios para que su camino al Inmortal sea fácil».
languages.original_text: "The Web bleeds in mourning for Domin'Theodora. We honoured the Giver of Life. We made generous sacrifices so that her path to the Undying One would be easy."

traits.locale_text: «La Red llora la muerte de Domin'Theodora. Honramos a la Dadora de Vida. Hicimos grandes sacrificios para que su camino al Inmortal sea fácil».

languages.text: 「ドミン・シオドーラを悼み、ウェブは血を流す。我々は生命の贈り主に敬意を表した。不死の者への道を容易にするため、惜しみない犠牲を払った」
languages.original_text: "The Web bleeds in mourning for Domin'Theodora. We honoured the Giver of Life. We made generous sacrifices so that her path to the Undying One would be easy."

traits.locale_text: 「ドミン・シオドーラを悼み、ウェブは血を流す。我々は生命の贈り主に敬意を表した。不死の者への道を容易にするため、惜しみない犠牲を払った」

languages.text: “织血罗网所有成员都在为秘者西奥多拉哀悼。我们怀念逝去的赐命者，我们献上了慷慨的祭品，让她面见不死之神的旅途变得更加顺畅。”
languages.original_text: "The Web bleeds in mourning for Domin'Theodora. We honoured the Giver of Life. We made generous sacrifices so that her path to the Undying One would be easy."

traits.locale_text: “织血罗网所有成员都在为秘者西奥多拉哀悼。我们怀念逝去的赐命者，我们献上了慷慨的祭品，让她面见不死之神的旅途变得更加顺畅。”

languages.original_text: "The Web bleeds in mourning for Domin'Theodora. We honoured the Giver of Life. We made generous sacrifices so that her path to the Undying One would be easy."

languages.text: "Ağ, Domin'Theodora'nın matemiyle kanıyor. Can Bahşeden'i onurlandırdık, cömert kurbanlar verdik ki Ölmeyen'e uzanan yolu kolaylıkla aşsın."
languages.original_text: "The Web bleeds in mourning for Domin'Theodora. We honoured the Giver of Life. We made generous sacrifices so that her path to the Undying One would be easy."
